languages.text: {n}Увесистый том покрыт кожей с человеческого лица, прошитой шнуром из жил. В центре обложки багровеет зловещий символ — вы никак не можете разглядеть его, детали ускользают от внимания, штрихи движутся и искривляются, запутывая все больше.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Увесистый том покрыт кожей с человеческого лица, прошитой шнуром из жил. В центре обложки багровеет зловещий символ — вы никак не можете разглядеть его, детали ускользают от внимания, штрихи движутся и искривляются, запутывая все больше.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The weighty tome is bound in the skin of a human face, laced with a cord woven from tendons. A sinister crimson symbol dominates the cover, but it is difficult for you to make out. The details elude your scrutiny and the strokes twist and shift, furthering the confusion.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Увесистый том покрыт кожей с человеческого лица, прошитой шнуром из жил. В центре обложки багровеет зловещий символ — вы никак не можете разглядеть его, детали ускользают от внимания, штрихи движутся и искривляются, запутывая все больше.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The weighty tome is bound in the skin of a human face, laced with a cord woven from tendons. A sinister crimson symbol dominates the cover, but it is difficult for you to make out. The details elude your scrutiny and the strokes twist and shift, furthering the confusion.{/n}

{n}The weighty tome is bound in skin taken from a human face and is laced with a cord woven from tendons. A sinister crimson symbol looms at the centre of its cover, but you cannot quite make it out. The details keep escaping your attention and the strokes twist and change places, furthering the confusion.{/n}

{n}The weighty tome is bound in the skin of a human face, laced with a cord woven from tendons. A sinister crimson symbol dominates the cover, but it is difficult for you to make out. The details elude your scrutiny and the strokes twist and shift, furthering the confusion.{/n}

{n}The weighty tome is bound in the skin of a human face, laced with a cord woven from tendons. A sinister crimson symbol dominates the cover, but it is difficult for you to make out. The details elude your scrutiny and the strokes twist and shift, furthering the confusion.{/n}

{n}The weighty tome is bound in the skin of a human face, laced with a cord woven from tendons. A sinister crimson symbol dominates the cover, but it is difficult for you to make out. The details elude your scrutiny and the strokes twist and shift, furthering the confusion.{/n}

languages.text: {n}分厚い書物は人間の顔の皮膚で綴じられており、腱で編まれた紐で綴じられている。表紙には邪悪な深紅のシンボルが描かれているが、どういう意味なのかはわからない。詳しく調べようにも形が刻一刻と変わり、ますますわからなくなる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The weighty tome is bound in the skin of a human face, laced with a cord woven from tendons. A sinister crimson symbol dominates the cover, but it is difficult for you to make out. The details elude your scrutiny and the strokes twist and shift, furthering the confusion.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}分厚い書物は人間の顔の皮膚で綴じられており、腱で編まれた紐で綴じられている。表紙には邪悪な深紅のシンボルが描かれているが、どういう意味なのかはわからない。詳しく調べようにも形が刻一刻と変わり、ますますわからなくなる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El pesado volumen está encuadernado con la piel de una cara humana hilada con tendones. Un siniestro símbolo escarlata domina la portada, pero no logras distinguirlo. Los detalles esquivan tu comprensión y los trazos se retuercen y cambian, aumentando la confusión.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The weighty tome is bound in the skin of a human face, laced with a cord woven from tendons. A sinister crimson symbol dominates the cover, but it is difficult for you to make out. The details elude your scrutiny and the strokes twist and shift, furthering the confusion.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El pesado volumen está encuadernado con la piel de una cara humana hilada con tendones. Un siniestro símbolo escarlata domina la portada, pero no logras distinguirlo. Los detalles esquivan tu comprensión y los trazos se retuercen y cambian, aumentando la confusión.{/n}

languages.text: {n}这本厚重的书是用人脸的皮肤与肌腱编织的细线装订在一起的。邪恶的血红色符号占据了整个封面，但你不明白这个符号代表什么。若隐若现的细节加上奇形怪状的笔触，你只感到越发摸不着头脑。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The weighty tome is bound in the skin of a human face, laced with a cord woven from tendons. A sinister crimson symbol dominates the cover, but it is difficult for you to make out. The details elude your scrutiny and the strokes twist and shift, furthering the confusion.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这本厚重的书是用人脸的皮肤与肌腱编织的细线装订在一起的。邪恶的血红色符号占据了整个封面，但你不明白这个符号代表什么。若隐若现的细节加上奇形怪状的笔触，你只感到越发摸不着头脑。{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'ouvrage épais est relié avec de la peau issue d'un visage humain et broché à l'aide de ce qui semble avoir été des tendons. La couverture est ornée d'un symbole écarlate sinistre, mais il vous est difficile de saisir ce qu'il signifie. Les détails échappent à votre regard et les traits paraissent se déformer, rendant l'analyse de la couverture encore plus complexe.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The weighty tome is bound in the skin of a human face, laced with a cord woven from tendons. A sinister crimson symbol dominates the cover, but it is difficult for you to make out. The details elude your scrutiny and the strokes twist and shift, furthering the confusion.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'ouvrage épais est relié avec de la peau issue d'un visage humain et broché à l'aide de ce qui semble avoir été des tendons. La couverture est ornée d'un symbole écarlate sinistre, mais il vous est difficile de saisir ce qu'il signifie. Les détails échappent à votre regard et les traits paraissent se déformer, rendant l'analyse de la couverture encore plus complexe.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Einband des dicken Wälzers besteht aus der Haut eines menschlichen Gesichts, mit einer aus Sehnen gedrehten Kordel verschnürt. Ein düsteres, tiefrotes Symbol prangt auf dem Einband, doch du kannst es nicht ganz ausmachen. Die Details entziehen sich deinem prüfenden Blick, und die Pinselstriche bewegen und verlagern sich, was die Verwirrung noch erhöht.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The weighty tome is bound in the skin of a human face, laced with a cord woven from tendons. A sinister crimson symbol dominates the cover, but it is difficult for you to make out. The details elude your scrutiny and the strokes twist and shift, furthering the confusion.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Gülle gibi bu cilt, bir insan yüzünün derisiyle kaplanıp insan sinirlerinden yapılma bir telle dikilmiş. Kapağında uğursuz görünümlü, koyu kırmızı bir sembol ağır bassa da bu sembolün ne olduğunu çözmekte zorlanıyorsun. İncelerken ayrıntılara akıl sır erdiremiyorsun. Sembolün hatları, bükülüp kayarak kafanı daha da karıştırıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The weighty tome is bound in the skin of a human face, laced with a cord woven from tendons. A sinister crimson symbol dominates the cover, but it is difficult for you to make out. The details elude your scrutiny and the strokes twist and shift, furthering the confusion.{/n}
